[Associate Professor of Business Analytics]{.hero-subtitle}

[Lally School of Management | Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute]{.hero-affiliation}

::: {.hero-description}
I research how artificial intelligence and digital technologies transform organizations, markets, and society. My work integrates perspectives from information systems, economics, and data science to advance understanding of AI fairness, digital platforms, and entrepreneurship ecosystems.

Currently serving as Area Head for Information Technology and Web Science and Principal Investigator for the NSF I-Corps Program at RPI.
